short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds buttons into YouTube history page to clear/delete short rows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I created this because I like to curate my YouTube history for better recommendations. It was quite difficult to clear the shorts manually and took a lot of clicks, so I automated it. Update from 9.9.2024: The YouTube history page structure just changed, I’ve updated the extension to work, but it doesn’t work 100% as smoothly as it did before.
